wwf.cranium.util

Class AudioTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • wwf.cranium.util.AudioTrack

  • public class AudioTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class to the minim framework. For wav file formats For best results, do not use the mp3 file format.
    Author:
    Andrew McGlynn
